text: Capoterra (Cabudèrra) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Metropolitan City of Cagliari in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 23,592 people lived there. Its area is 68.49 km². It is 54 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Metropolitan City of Cagliari
title: Capoterra
